Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Features for device information and control
Category.Description: Category of features for device information and control

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.Description: Category of features controlling image format

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Features for acquisition and trigger control
Category.Description: Category of features for acquisition and trigger control.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Features controlling the digital I/O lines
Category.Description: Category of features controlling the digital I/O lines.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Features controlling analog characteristics of the video signal
Category.Description: Category of features controlling analog characteristics of the video signal.

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.Description: Category of look-up table (LUT) control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.Description: Category of features controlling user sets.

Category.Name: LEDControl
Category.Description: Category of features controlling camera signalling LEDs.

String.Name: DeviceModelName
String.ToolTip: Indicates the model name of the device
String.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the model name of the device.

String.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
String.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device
String.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device

String.Name: DeviceID
String.ToolTip: A unique identifier for the device such as a serial number or a GUID
String.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that provides a unique identifier for the device such as a serial number or a GUID.

String.Name: DeviceUserID
String.ToolTip: A device ID that is user programmable
String.Description: Custom device ID to be set by user.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the temperature sources available for readout
Enumeration.Description: Lists the temperature sources available for readout

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature on sensor
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature on sensor

EnumEntry.Name: SensorBoard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature on sensor board
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature on sensor board

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Shows the current temperature of the selected target in degrees celcius
Float.Description: Shows the current temperature of the selected target in degrees celcius

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features changes during acquisition.
Integer.Description: Used by the Transport Layer to prevent critical features changes during acquisition.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimitMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is active

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is disabled
EnumEntry.Description: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is disabled

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is enabled
EnumEntry.Description: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit is enabled

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth (in Bytes per second) of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth (in Bytes per second) of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth.

Integer.Name: TestPendingAck
Integer.ToolTip: On write, the device waits a time period of TestPendingAck ms before acknowledging the write.
Integer.Description: On write, the device waits a time period of TestPendingAck ms before acknowledging the write.

String.Name: DeviceFamilyName
String.ToolTip: Indicates the name of the device family
String.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the name of the device family

Integer.Name: TimeStamp
Integer.ToolTip: Current value of the device timestamp counter
Integer.Description: Current value of the device timestamp counter

String.Name: DeviceType
String.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates if the device hardware version

Integer.Name: SensorOutputChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of digital data output channels from sensor used
Integer.Description: Number of digital data output channels from sensor used

Enumeration.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Lists the device units which contain firmware
Enumeration.Description: Lists the device units which contain firmware

EnumEntry.Name: FPGA1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Firmware version of FPGA1
EnumEntry.Description: Firmware version of FPGA1

EnumEntry.Name: MCU1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Firmware version of MCU1
EnumEntry.Description: Firmware version of MCU1

EnumEntry.Name: MCU2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Firmware version of MCU2
EnumEntry.Description: Firmware version of MCU2

Integer.Name: DeviceStatus
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the state of the device.
Integer.Description: Reads the state of the device.
Integer.DisplayName: Reads the state of the device.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the width of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the width of the area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the height of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the height of the area of interest in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the format of the pixel data transmitted for acquired images
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the format of the pixel data transmitted for acquired images.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format 'Mono10'
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format 'Mono10'

EnumEntry.Name: Mono10p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format 10bit packed (4 pixels in 5 bytes)
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format 10bit packed (4 pixels in 5 bytes)

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format 'Mono 12'
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format 'Mono 12'

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format 12bit packed (2 pixels in 3 bytes)
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format 12bit packed (2 pixels in 3 bytes)

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Mono 8
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 8.

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the horizontal binning value
Integer.Description: This value sets the horizontal binning value.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the vertical binning value
Integer.Description: This value sets the vertical binning value.

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the horizontal decimation value
Integer.Description: This value sets the horizontal decimation value.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the vertical decimation value
Integer.Description: This value sets the vertical decimation value.

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the X offset (left offset) of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the X offset (left offset) for the area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the Y offset (top offset) of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the Y offset (top offset) for the area of interest in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Camera pixel color filter
Enumeration.Description: Camera pixel color filter

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Monochrome
EnumEntry.Description: Monochrome

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceSpecific_Counter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: 128 bit counter
EnumEntry.Description: 128 bit counter

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select test pattern - Grey Horizontal Ramp
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor

Integer.Name: DeviceModeID
Integer.ToolTip: Gets current device mode ID
Integer.Description: This enumeration gets current device mode ID

Integer.Name: SensorBitDepth
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the Sensor Bit Depth
Integer.Description: Sensor Bit Depth provided by the analog to digital converter

Enumeration.Name: TestPatternGeneratorSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects test pattern generator
Enumeration.Description: Selects which test pattern generator is controlled by the TestPattern feature

EnumEntry.Name: Fpga
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Chooses fpga pattern generator
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the fpga test pattern generator

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Chooses sensor pattern generator
EnumEntry.Description: TestPattern feature will control the sensor test pattern generator

Enumeration.Name: BinningSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects binning engine
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select sensor binning
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor binning

Enumeration.Name: DecimationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects decimation engine
Enumeration.Description: Selects which decimation engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select sensor decimation
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor decimation

Enumeration.Name: BinningPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects binning pattern format
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning pattern is used

EnumEntry.Name: Mono
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Monochrome binning pattern
EnumEntry.Description: Monochrome binning pattern

Enumeration.Name: DecimationPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects decimation pattern format
Enumeration.Description: Selects which decimation pattern is used

EnumEntry.Name: Mono
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Monochrome decimation pattern
EnumEntry.Description: Monochrome decimation pattern

Integer.Name: ImageAbsoluteOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Gets offset of image to sensor first possible pixel
Integer.Description: Gets offset of image to sensor first possible pixel

Integer.Name: ImageAbsoluteOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Gets offset of image to sensor first possible pixel
Integer.Description: Gets offset of image to sensor first possible pixel

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the image acquisition mode
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the image acquisition mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode to continuous
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to continuous.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.Description: This command starts the acquisition of images. If the camera is set for single frame acquisition, it will start acquisition of one frame. If the camera is set for continuous frame acquisition, it will start continuous acquisition of frames.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.Description: If the camera is set for continuous image acquisition and acquisition has been started, this command stops the acquisition of images.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the exposure mode
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the exposure mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.

Integer.Name: ExposureTime
Integer.ToolTip: Directly sets the camera exposure time
Integer.Description: This integer value sets the camera exposure time

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the trigger type to configure. Once a trigger type has been selected, all changes to the trigger settings will be applied to the selected trigger.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the trigger type to configure. Once a trigger type has been selected, all changes to the trigger settings will be applied to the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger that starts the Acquisition of one or many frames according to AcquisitionMode

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the duration of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame start trigger for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the exposure start trigger for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameBurstStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.ng the capture of the bursts of frames in an acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame start trigger for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the frame start trigger for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame start trigger for configuration.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the trigger mode for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected trigger to off
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected trigger to off.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected trigger to on
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected trigger to on.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates a software trigger signal that is used when the trigger source is set to
Command.Description: This command generates a software trigger signal. The software trigger signal will be used if the trigger source is set to

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the signal source for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the signal source for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Line5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 4
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 4.

EnumEntry.Name: Line7
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 4
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 4.

EnumEntry.Name: Line8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 4
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 4.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the software trigger as the signal source for the selected trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to software trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Trigger Activation Signal Type
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling or rising edge of the source signal

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the selected trigger to become active on the falling edge of the source signal
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the selected trigger to become active on the falling edge of the source signal

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is high

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid as long as the level of the source signal is low

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the selected trigger to become active on the rising edge of the source signal
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the sets the selected trigger to become active on the rising edge of the source signal.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionBurstFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Sets number of frames acquired by burst.
Integer.Description: Sets number of frames acquired by burst.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionTimingMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition timing
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the image acquisition timing mode.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameRateLimit
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Acquisition frame rate is limited by FrameRate feature
EnumEntry.Description: Acquisition frame rate is limited by FrameRate feature

EnumEntry.Name: FreeRun
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Acquisition free run - maximum frame rate at given exposure
EnumEntry.Description: Acquisition free run - maximum frame rate at given exposure

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: Trigger overlap mode
Enumeration.Description: Trigger overlap mode

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: All overlaps are accepted
EnumEntry.Description: All overlaps are accepted

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No trigger overlap is permitted
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger overlap is permitted

EnumEntry.Name: PreviousFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted (latched) at any time during the capture of the previous frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted (latched) at any time during the capture of the previous frame.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.

Integer.Name: ExposureBurstCount
Integer.ToolTip: Set the number of times of exposure
Integer.Description: Set the number of times of exposure at Multi Exposure

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the I/O line to configure. Once a line has been selected, all changes to the line settings will be applied to the selected line.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the I/O line to configure. Once a line has been selected, all changes to the line settings will be applied to the selected line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 1
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 1

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 2
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 2

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 3
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 3.

EnumEntry.Name: Line4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 4
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 4.

EnumEntry.Name: Line5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 5
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 5.

EnumEntry.Name: Line6
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 6
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 6.

EnumEntry.Name: Line7
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 7
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 7.

EnumEntry.Name: Line8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the physical line 8
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the physical line 8.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Input
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected line to input
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected line to input.

EnumEntry.Name: Output
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected line to output
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected line to output

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the inverter function for the selected line
Boolean.Description: This boolean value enables the inverter function for the selected line.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.Description: Reports the current status of the selected line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the source signal for the selected line (if the selected line is an output)
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the internally generated camera signal (source signal) for the selected line when the selected line is an output.

EnumEntry.Name: Blink
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is blinking
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is blinking

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame (or Line).

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line1
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line1

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line2
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line2

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line3
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line3

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus4
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line4
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line4

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus5
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line5
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line5

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus6
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line6
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line6

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus7
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line7
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line7

EnumEntry.Name: IOStatus8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line8
EnumEntry.Description: Source for selected line is IO Status of Line8

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is disabled. Off.
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is disabled. Off.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is disabled. On.
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is disabled. On.

EnumEntry.Name: PCIeLane
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Describes number of PCIe lanes
EnumEntry.Description: Describes number of PCIe lanes

EnumEntry.Name: PCIeSpeed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Describes PCIe speed
EnumEntry.Description: Describes PCIe speed

EnumEntry.Name: Readout
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing readout
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing readout

Enumeration.Name: LineFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the electrical configuration of the selected line
Enumeration.Description: Controls the current electrical format of the selected physical input or output Line.

EnumEntry.Name: LED
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected line is LED indicator
EnumEntry.Description: Selected line is LED indicator

EnumEntry.Name: NonIsolated
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected line is non isolated (e.g. bidirectional)
EnumEntry.Description: Selected line is non isolated (e.g. bidirectional)

EnumEntry.Name: OptoCoupled
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the electrical configuration of the selected line to opto-coupled
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the electrical configuration of the selected line to opto-coupled.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: User Output Selector
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select output 0 for logic level
EnumEntry.Description: Select output 0 for logic level

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select output 1 for logic level
EnumEntry.Description: Select output 1 for logic level

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select output 2 for logic level
EnumEntry.Description: Select output 2 for logic level

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select output 3 for logic level
EnumEntry.Description: Select output 3 for logic level

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.ToolTip: The current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield
Integer.Description: Reports the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValueAll
Boolean.Description: Value of all the bits of the User Output register. It is subject to the UserOutputValueAllMask

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValueAllMask
Boolean.Description: Write Mask to apply to the value specified by UserOutputValueAll before writing it in the User Output register

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the gain control to configure. Once a gain control has been selected, all changes to the gain settings will be applied to the selected control.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the gain control to configure. Once a gain control has been selected, all changes to the gain settings will be applied to the selected control.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain (in dB) as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Boolean.Name: LUTEnable
Boolean.Description: This boolean value enables the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the LUT element to access
Integer.Description: This value sets the LUT element to access. This value is used to index into a LUT array.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the value of the LUT element at the LUT index
Integer.Description: This value sets the value of the LUT element at the LUT index.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Size of the payload in bytes
Integer.Description: Size of the payload in bytes. This is the total number of bytes sent in the payload. Image data + chunk data if present. No packet headers.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelNameReg
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the model name of the device

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersionReg
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device

StringReg.Name: DeviceIDReg
StringReg.ToolTip: A unique identifier for the device such as a serial number or a GUID

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserIDReg
StringReg.ToolTip: A device ID that is user programmable

StringReg.Name: DeviceFamilyNameReg
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the name of the device family

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the camera.
